RelatedSentence: A coalition health reform could trigger a fresh cash crisis immediately after the election , NHS officials have warned .
Doctors fear that the NHS budget is going to be used to provide funding to plug gaps in social care at a time when the system is already under huge strain .
A Â£3.8 billion pot for health and social care was announced in the autumn under changes agreed by Jeremy Hunt , the health secretary , and Eric Pickles , the communities secretary .
